name: Gymnophobia
description:
This is our game for game jam "Geta Game Jam 8", with theme "Dreams and Nightmares" and rule "No text".

Rules:
You are in a dream, where you're being compltely naked in the world where everybody hates nudity. Your goal is to hide behind the bushes when danger and collect clothes to get throght gate in the end of the level.

There was 4 people developing this: 
ClumsySeal as an Artist
@Floyd as Programmer
Anonimous as an Animator
@Legosky007 as Gamedesigner
